Package ctf2025

Class CtfWorld

java.lang.Object
info.gridworld.world.World<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>
info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld
ctf2025.CtfWorld
public class CtfWorld extends info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld
This class is a modified version of ActorWorld for use with the class's Capture the Flag competition

  • Method Details

    • step

      public void step()
      Performs one "step" in the CtfWorld. On the first step of a match, all Players from boith teams are added to the players instance variable After the last step, a winner is determined based on scores Intermediate steps collect all the Players and shuffle them together and have them all act in random order
      Overrides:
      step in class info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld
